# The code used in this section was adapted from https://ftp.yz.yamagata-u.ac.jp/pub/cran/web/packages/geocmeans/vignettes/introduction.html

# Library
```{r}
library(sf)
library(geocmeans)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(dplyr)
library(viridis)
library(spdep)
```

# Pre Fire

#Prepare the data
```{r}
# Define Fields
iNat_AnalysisFields <- c("avg_positional_accuracy","avg_quality_grade","avg_agreement_score","avg_datediff","aves_count","plantae_count","fungi_count","animalia_count","insecta_count","other_count","arachnida_count","reptilia_count","mammalia_count","mollusca_count","chromista_count","amphibia_count","actinopterygii_count","protozoa_count")

#rescaling the columns
iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both <- iNat_PreFire_Both_Grids[iNat_AnalysisFields]

# Make file spatial
iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both <- as_Spatial(iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both)

# Reformat data
iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both <- iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both@data[iNat_AnalysisFields]
for (Col in names(iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both)){
  iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both[[Col]] <- scale(iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both[[Col]])
}

# Make N/A columns 0
iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both$other_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both$chromista_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both$actinopterygii_count <- 0

# Calculate Queen Neighbours
Neighbours <- poly2nb(iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both, queen = TRUE)
WMat <- nb2listw(Neighbours, style = "W", zero.policy = TRUE)

#preparing some elements for further mapping
iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both$OID <- as.character(1:nrow(iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both))
FortiData <- broom::tidy(iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both,region="OID")

# Calculate SGFCM
iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both_SGFCM <- SGFCMeans(iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both,WMat,k = 4,m=1.5, alpha=0.95, beta = 0.65,
                                                  tol=0.0001, standardize = FALSE, verbose = FALSE, seed = 456)
# Make a cluster map
SGFCMMaps <- mapClusters(geodata = iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both, object = iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both_SGFCM$Belongings,undecided = 0.45)
```

# Maps
```{r}
# Plot a map per cluster value
ggarrange(SGFCMMaps$ProbaMaps[[1]], nrow = 1, ncol = 1,
          common.legend = TRUE, legend = "bottom")

ggarrange(SGFCMMaps$ProbaMaps[[2]], nrow = 1, ncol = 1,
          common.legend = TRUE, legend = "bottom")

ggarrange(SGFCMMaps$ProbaMaps[[3]], nrow = 1, ncol = 1,
          common.legend = TRUE, legend = "bottom")

ggarrange(SGFCMMaps$ProbaMaps[[4]], nrow = 1, ncol = 1,
          common.legend = TRUE, legend = "bottom")

# Plot the Final map
# Ensure all values below 0.45 are in undecided
Undecided <- undecidedUnits(iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both_SGFCM$Belongings,0.45)
iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both$FinalCluster <- ifelse(Undecided=="Undecided",
                                                           "Undecided",paste("cluster",Undecided,sep="_"))

#mapping the groups
DFmapping <- merge(FortiData,iNat_Cluster_Poly_PreFire_Both,by.x="id",by.y="OID")

ggplot(data=DFmapping)+
  geom_polygon(aes(x=long,y=lat,group=group,fill=FinalCluster),color=rgb(0,0,0,0))+
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1)+
  ggtitle("iNat_PreFire_Both_FinalCluster") +
  scale_fill_manual(name="Clusters",values = c("cluster_V1"="palegreen3",
                                               "cluster_V2"="Firebrick",
                                               "cluster_V3"="yellow",
                                               "cluster_V4"="steelblue",
                                               "Undecided"=rgb(0,0,0,0.4)))+
  theme( axis.title = element_blank(),
         axis.text = element_blank(),
         axis.ticks = element_blank()
  )
```

# Spider plots
```{r}
spiderPlots(iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both, iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both_SGFCM$Belongings,
            chartcolors = c("palegreen3","Firebrick","yellow","steelblue"))
title("iNat_PreFire_Both clusters and input variables")
```

# Stability Checks on Clusters
```{r}
# Find the jaccard index stability values
bootvalues <- boot_group_validation(iNat_Cluster_PreFire_Both_SGFCM, nsim = 1000, maxiter = 1000, 
                                    tol = 0.0001, verbose = FALSE)

melted_df <- reshape2::melt(bootvalues$group_consistency)
melted_df$variable <- as.factor(melted_df$variable)

# Plot the map
ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(mapping = aes(x = value), data = melted_df, bins = 30) +
  labs(title = "stability of clusters for iNat_PreFire_Both", subtitle = "for 1000 iterations",
       x = "Jaccard index") +
  facet_wrap(vars(variable), ncol=2) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0.5, linetype="dotted", 
                color = "red", size=1)
```


# Remove temp files
```{r}
rm(DFmapping,FortiData,Undecided,SGFCMMaps,WMat,Neighbours,bootvalues,melted_df,df_gp1,df_gp2,df_gp3,df_gp4)
```

# Fire

```{r}
iNat_AnalysisFields <- c("avg_positional_accuracy","avg_quality_grade","avg_agreement_score","avg_datediff","aves_count","plantae_count","fungi_count","animalia_count","insecta_count","other_count","arachnida_count","reptilia_count","mammalia_count","mollusca_count","chromista_count","amphibia_count","actinopterygii_count","protozoa_count")

#rescaling the columns
iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both <- iNat_Fire_Both_Grids[iNat_AnalysisFields]

iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both <- as_Spatial(iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both)

iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both <- iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both@data[iNat_AnalysisFields]
for (Col in names(iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both)){
  iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both[[Col]] <- scale(iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both[[Col]])
}

iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both$aves_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both$other_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both$mollusca_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both$chromista_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both$amphibia_count <- 0
iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both$protozoa_count <- 0

Neighbours <- poly2nb(iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both, queen = TRUE)
WMat <- nb2listw(Neighbours, style = "W", zero.policy = TRUE)

#preparing some elements for further mapping
iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both$OID <- as.character(1:nrow(iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both))

FortiData <- broom::tidy(iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both,region="OID")

iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both_SGFCM <- SGFCMeans(iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both,WMat,k = 4,m=1.5, alpha=0.95, beta = 0.65,
                                                  tol=0.0001, standardize = FALSE, verbose = FALSE, seed = 456)

SGFCMMaps <- mapClusters(geodata = iNat_Cluster_Poly_Fire_Both, object = iNat_Cluster_Fire_Both_SGFCM$Belongings,undecided = 0.45)
```

```{r}
                                               "Undecided"=rgb(0,0,0,0.4)))+
  theme( axis.title = element_blank(),
```

```{r}
iNat_AnalysisFields <- c("avg_positional_accuracy","avg_quality_grade","avg_agreement_score","avg_datediff","aves_count","plantae_count","fungi_count","animalia_count","insecta_count","other_count","arachnida_count","reptilia_count","mammalia_count","mollusca_count","chromista_count","amphibia_count","actinopterygii_count","protozoa_count")
```
